tasks.label: xpra-up
args: set -e; if ! command -v xpra >/dev/null 2>&1; then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y xpra; fi; mkdir -p .devcontainer; if ! pgrep -x xpra >/dev/null; then xpra start :100 --bind-tcp=0.0.0.0:9876 --html=on --xvfb="Xvfb -screen 0 1280x800x24 -nolisten tcp -ac" --daemon=yes; fi; echo "Xpra ready at forwarded port 9876 (HTML5 viewer)";
